title: cmd/gc: crash on large if {} else if {} ... chain
body:
by **vinjvinj**: 
This is a large autogenerated test file with a large number of if {} else if {} else if
{} ...

This used to work with an older weekly and does not work any more with the current tip

test.go:653: memory exhausted
test2.go:10: mark left on the stack
test2.go:10: too many errors
